content:
Homework 2, due Tuesday, Jan 31, in class.

Do the following exercises in the GT Book:
R-2.9 [10pts]
R-2.11 + for each call to printMe() method explain *why* this is its behavior [30 pts]
C-2.1 [20pts]
C-2.2 [20pts]
C-2.5 [20pts]
In exercises C-2.2 and C-2.5 please give us a *concise* code.

Note: exercise R-2.8 is cancelled (because R-2.11 is very similar...)
